question: What is a hash table?
options: A data structure that maps keys to values
A data structure that stores elements in a sorted order
A data structure that stores elements in a linked list
A data structure that stores elements in a stack
answer: A data structure that maps keys to values

question: What is the purpose of a hash function?
options: To map keys to array indices
To sort elements in a hash table
To store elements in a linked list
To delete elements from a hash table
answer: To map keys to array indices

question: What is a collision in a hash table?
options: When two keys map to the same index
When a key is not found in the hash table
When the hash table is full
When the hash function is not working
answer: When two keys map to the same index

What is the time complexity of inserting an element into a hash table?
What is the time complexity of deleting an element from a hash table?
What is the main advantage of using a hash table?
What is the main disadvantage of using a hash table?
What is the purpose of linear probing in hash tables?
options: To sort elements in a hash table
To delete elements from a hash table
To insert elements into a hash table

question: What is the time complexity of resolving collisions using linear probing?
What is the purpose of chaining in hash tables?
options: To sort elements in a hash table
To delete elements from a hash table
To insert elements into a hash table

question: What is the time complexity of resolving collisions using chaining?
What is the main advantage of using chaining over linear probing?
What is the main disadvantage of using chaining over linear probing?
What is the purpose of a hash function in a hash table?
options: To map keys to array indices
To sort elements in a hash table
To delete elements from a hash table
To insert elements into a hash table
answer: To map keys to array indices

question: Which hashing method uses linked lists to store multiple elements in the same bucket?
What is the worst-case time complexity of searching in a hash table?
Which property makes a good hash function?
options: Generating the same hash value for all keys
Generating hash values that are easy to predict

question: What is the primary disadvantage of hashing?
What is a collision in hashing?
options: When two keys generate the same hash value
When a hash table is full
answer: When two keys generate the same hash value
